# Overview
Almost always, your first model is not that great. You generally want to improve your models to find a good one.

This module discusses ways to improve your models. 

# Learning Objectives

* Be familiar with methods to improve models.
* Be able to perform different model improvement tasks.


# Content

The module consists of the following units:

* [Model improvement introduction](./model-improvement-introduction/model-improvement-introduction.qmd)
* [Subset selection](./model-improvement-subset/model-improvement-subset.qmd)
* [Regularization](./model-improvement-regularization/model-improvement-regularization.qmd)
* [Tuning](./model-improvement-tuning/model-improvement-tuning.qmd)
